name: @functai-schemas/hello-world
description: Hello World schema for Functional AI

scripts.create_schema: echo "declare const schema: $(cat schema.json); export default schema; export type Schema = typeof schema" > schema.d.ts
scripts.create_index: echo "import schema from './schema.json'; import { Schema } from './schema'; const _schema = { ...schema } as Schema; export default _schema;" > index.ts

author: Ribhararnus Pracutiar
